title: Desperate Policies of Militarization: Majority World Faith and the Defeat of Western Nihilism
description:
Western governments do not even bother now to hide the essential nihilism of their policies in the face of the decline of their political-military and economic power relative to the majority world. This nihilism of the ruling elites of the …
